title: ﻿क्या चुनाव आयुक्त अशोक लवासा भयानक कार दुर्घटना में बाल बाल बचे?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Chief Election Commissioner Sunil Arora issues statement on EC Ashok Lavasa's purported letter to him, says, 'an unsavory and avoidable controversy reported in sections of media today about internal functioning of ECI in respect of handling of Model Code of Conduct.' (3/3) pic.twitter.com/yuRxOHMaGL
